result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Luiz Miguel Silva-Valdez

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Luiz Miguel Silva-Valdez appeared by video.  Attorney Haley E Wentz appeared by video for Luiz Miguel Silva-Valdez.  Prosecuting attorney Sarah M Dahdouh appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Bayley Waller appeared by video under the student practice law with Attorney Haley Wentz.
Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense counsel has received discovery and an offer from the state. Defense requests status date to determine case posture. 
Case adjourned to Branch 30. This case will be heard via Zoom. Zoom meeting information provided to parties.
Status conference scheduled for December 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Supervision Report received and filed.  bm
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Luiz Miguel Silva-Valdez appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michael J Cerniglia appeared by video for Luiz Miguel Silva-Valdez. ** appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION. This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kelly AT.
